message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Your turn! How about we meet in the middle? This accounts for the inflation.
I can go a bit lower, but I still think I deserve the bigger share.
This seems fair considering the time pressure and the inflation working against me.
I'm willing to meet you closer to the middle, but I still think I have the upper hand.
Time is running out! This is my final offer for a reasonable split.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. The inflation is really hurting your end, isn't it?
